mapper.select: SELECT id, codeId, name, position, birthday, nationality From employees
SELECT id, codeId, name, position, birthday, nationality From employees WHERE codeId = #{codeId} OR birthday = #{birthday} OR name = #{name} ORDER BY id desc

SELECT id, codeId, name, position, birthday, nationality From employees WHERE (codeId = #{codeId} AND name = #{name}) OR (codeId = #{codeId} AND birthday = #{birthday}) OR (name = #{name} AND birthday = #{birthday}) ORDER BY id desc
SELECT id, codeId, name, position, birthday, nationality From employees WHERE codeId = #{codeId} AND name = #{name} AND birthday = #{birthday} ORDER BY id
SELECT id FROM employees ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO employees(id, codeId, name, position, birthday, nationality) VALUES (#{id}, #{codeId}, #{name}, #{position}, #{birthday}, #{nationality})
mapper.update: UPDATE employees SET codeId = #{codeId}, name = #{name}, position = #{position}, birthday = #{birthday}, nationality = #{nationality} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM employees WHERE codeId = N#{codeId}
